Join us at our fourth Citizen Activist Training on Monday, December 13, 7 p.m. as we learn how to choose our best targets and tactics by mapping the power structures within our communities.

Plan to Win by Mapping Power

Monday, December 13, 7 p.m.
Zoom

RSVP Today

Please note: This link will take you to a third-party website, zoom.us.

Loud Light is dedicated to creating a better Kansas by increasing civic participation, educating voters, building coalitions, and empowering people to directly affect the laws and decisions that impact us. In this session, Melissa Stiehler, Loud Light's Advocacy Director, will review why power-mapping is essential to effective organizing and how to create our own power maps, along with a live example and an open Q&A on strategic planning.

RSVP for our 7 p.m. session on Monday, December 13.

We look forward to seeing you there,
